content:
In this workshop hosted by Planet Tech’Care, we present BoaviztAPI, one of main the project at Boavizta. BoaviztAPI enables developers and organizations estimate the environmental impacts of IT resources such as servers, cloud instances and end-user devices. We explain how the bottom-up methodology is built and demostrate some use cases using the API.
Don’t hesitate to check out the online documentation and the demo project Datavizta.

content:
A list of the projects I am currently involved in:
Awesome Green AI - An awesome page to list Green AI resources such as tools and scientific papers. BoaviztAPI - An API to assess the environmental impacts of server, cloud instances or end-user devices. EcoLogits - A Python/JS library to track the energy consumption and environmental footprint of GenAI. EcoLogits Calculator - A Gradio web app that uses EcoLogits to estimate the environmental impacts of generic use cases of GenAI.
